dmca.title: Comcast Notice to Subscriber
dmca.body:
Dear Comcast High-Speed Internet Subscriber:

Comcast has received a notification of claimed infringement made under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (the"DMCA"). This notification, made by a copyright owner of its authorized agent, reports an alleged infringement of one or more copyright works made on or over comcast's [sic] High-Speed Internet service (the "Service"). The works identified in the notification of claimed infringement are listed below. In accordance with the DMCA and comcast's [sic] acceptable use policy, Comcast requests that you Immediatley [sic] remove the allegedly infringing works from the service or comcast will be forced to remove or block access to the works. 

If you believe in goodfaith [sic] that the allegedly infringing works have been removed or blocked by mistake or misidentification, then you may send a counter notification to comcast [sic]. Upon comcast's [sic] receipt of a counter notification that satiffies [sic] the requirmenets [sic] of the DMCA, Comcast will provide a copy of the counter notification to the party who sent the origional [sic] notification of clamed [sic] infringement. We wil [sic] then follow the DMCA's procedures with respece [sic] to a received counter notifiation.

For more information regarding comcast's [sic] copyright infringement policy, procedured [sic],and concact [sic] information, please reead [sic] our acceptable use policy by clicking on the terms of service link at http://www.comcat.net [sic]

sincerely, 

Comcast networks and Abuse and Observance Team

Copyright work(s) identifed in the notification of claimed infringement
